statements: DELETE FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' AND start_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM crop_rotation_experiments WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM rotation_sequence_details WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND planting_date < '2022-08-01';
DELETE FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_id = 100 AND crop_name = 'Corn';
DELETE FROM crop_rotation WHERE crop_family = 'Legume' AND crop_name = 'Beans';
DELETE FROM ExperimentResults WHERE experiment_id = 100 AND crop_id = 2;
DELETE FROM ExperimentResults WHERE crop_id = 5 AND yield < 1000;
